name: KeeperDAO
description: KeeperDAO is an on-chain liquidity underwriter for DeFi. KeeperDAO incentivizes game theory optimal strategy for cooperation among on-chain arbitrageurs and provides an efficient mechanism for large scale arbitrage and liquidation trades on all DeFi protocols.

en.name: KeeperDAO
en.description: KeeperDAO is an on-chain liquidity underwriter for DeFi. KeeperDAO incentivizes game theory optimal strategy for cooperation among on-chain arbitrageurs and provides an efficient mechanism for large scale arbitrage and liquidation trades on all DeFi protocols.

fr.name: KeeperDAO
fr.description: KeeperDAO est un souscripteur de liquidités en chaîne pour l'écosystème DeFi. KeeperDAO encourage la stratégie optimale de la théorie des jeux (game theory) pour la coopération entre les arbitragistes on-chain et fournit un mécanisme efficace pour les transactions d'arbitrage et de liquidation à grande échelle sur tous les protocoles DeFi.

es.name: KeeperDAO
es.description: KeeperDAO es un suscriptor de liquidez en cadena para DeFi. KeeperDAO incentiva la estrategia óptima de la teoría de juegos para la cooperación entre los arbitrajistas en cadena y proporciona un mecanismo eficiente para el arbitraje a gran escala y las transacciones de liquidación en todos los protocolos DeFi.

de.name: KeeperDAO
de.description: KeeperDAO ist ein Liquiditätszeichner auf der Kette für DeFi. KeeperDAO schafft Anreize für eine spieltheoretisch optimale Strategie für die Zusammenarbeit zwischen Arbitrageuren auf der Kette und bietet einen effizienten Mechanismus für groß angelegte Arbitrage- und Liquidationsgeschäfte auf allen DeFi-Protokollen.

pt.name: KeeperDAO
pt.description: KeeperDAO é um segurador de liquidez no blockchain para o DeFi. KeeperDAO incentiva uma estratégia ótima de teoria dos jogos para cooperação entre arbitradores da rede, e fornece uma mecanismo eficiente para arbitragem em larga escala e negociações de liquidação em todos os protocolos DeFi.

el.name: KeeperDAO
el.description: KeeperDAO is an on-chain liquidity underwriter for DeFi. KeeperDAO incentivizes game theory optimal strategy for cooperation among on-chain arbitrageurs and provides an efficient mechanism for large scale arbitrage and liquidation trades on all DeFi protocols.

tr.name: KeeperDAO
tr.description: KeeperDAO, DeFi için bir zincir üstü likidite sigortacısıdır. KeeperDAO, zincir üstü arbitrajcılar arasında işbirliği için oyun teorisi optimal stratejisini teşvik eder ve tüm DeFi protokollerinde büyük ölçekli arbitraj ve tasfiye işlemleri için verimli bir mekanizma sağlar.

vi.name: KeeperDAO
vi.description: KeeperDAO is an on-chain liquidity underwriter for DeFi. KeeperDAO incentivizes game theory optimal strategy for cooperation among on-chain arbitrageurs and provides an efficient mechanism for large scale arbitrage and liquidation trades on all DeFi protocols.

zh.name: KeeperDAO
zh.description: KeeperDAO is an on-chain liquidity underwriter for DeFi. KeeperDAO incentivizes game theory optimal strategy for cooperation among on-chain arbitrageurs and provides an efficient mechanism for large scale arbitrage and liquidation trades on all DeFi protocols.

hi.name: KeeperDAO
hi.description: Keeper DAO DeFi के लिए ऑन-चेन लिक्विडिटी अंडरराइटर है। Keeper DAO ऑन-चेन आर्बिट्राजर्स के बीच सहयोग के लिए गेम थ्योरी इष्टतम रणनीति को प्रोत्साहित करता है और सभी DeFi प्रोटोकॉल पर बड़े पैमाने पर आर्बिट्रेज और परिसमापन ट्रेडों के लिए एक कुशल तंत्र प्रदान करता है।
